geom_alluvial_text() geom_alluvial_label()
geom_alluvial_label
geom_sankey()
geom_sankey Creates a sankey plot which visualize flows between nodes. Each observation needs to have a `x` aesthetic as well as a `next_x` column which declares where that observation should flow. Also each observation should have a `node` and a `next_node` aesthetic which provide information about which group in the y-direction. By default each row of the data frame is counted to calculate the size of flows. A manual flow value can be added with the `value` aesthetic.
